result.description: Trigger a warning when the aria-label is left empty after a page is saved.
result.notification_text: Add text alternatives that describe the image unless it's purely decorative.
result.name: image alt text empty

result.description: Multiple forms are allowed on a page, but it's important that they all utilize a particular preset in that situation.
result.notification_text: This page has multiple form controllers, and at least one form controller is missing a preset. All form controllers must use the "Form controller preset". Open the configuration for the form controller and ensure that the form controller preset is selected from the preset dropdown for every form controller.
result.sys_name: form controller multiple must use form preset
result.name: form controller multiple must use form preset

result.description: Trigger a warning when the label is left empty after a page is saved.
result.notification_text: Add a label or icon that explains how users should interact with the input field, such as 'Search' or a magnifying glass icon.
result.name: input password label empty

result.description: Buttons should have at least one event, or else they do not service any purpose.
result.notification_text: Buttons need at least one event to function when clicked. You can add an event on the 'Events' pane for the button.
result.name: button bare event empty

result.description: Trigger a warning when the aria label is left as the default value after a page is saved.
result.notification_text: Add a descriptive name that conveys the button's function, such as 'Edit', 'Delete', 'Create', etc.
result.name: button iconic aria-label empty

result.notification_text: Add a visible label for each interactive element within radio buttons.

result.description: Buttons should at least have either one event or a tooltip, or else they do not service any purpose.
result.notification_text: Buttons need at least one event to function when clicked. You can add an event on the 'Events' pane for the button. If no event is added, at least a tooltip is needed to provide some feedback to the user.
result.name: button iconic event empty

result.description: This page has multiple Form controllers with "Is mapped to App Shell" set to true, which may cause unexpected behaviors. A general guideline is that exactly one of your form controllers should have "Is mapped to App Shell" property set to true.
result.notification_text: This page has multiple Form controllers with "Is mapped to App Shell" set to true, which may cause unexpected behaviors. A general guideline is that exactly one of your form controllers should have "Is mapped to App Shell" property set to true.
result.sys_name: controller too many mapped to app shell
result.name: controller too many mapped to app shell

result.description: Buttons should have at least one event, or else they do not service any purpose.

result.description: This rule checks to see if there are any elements that have 'isHidden' set statically to true.
result.notification_text: Component is always hidden. Check the 'Component visibility' configuration of the component to unhide it or to dynamically set the value.
result.sys_name: composition elements should not be statically hidden
result.name: composition elements should not be statically hidden
